评论详情: The color depicted is a nice golden caramel, but it is an orangish brown.  Very nice quality but zippered opening is short, difficult to get the pillow inserted.  Love the pattern, reordered in black.

I bought this to go in the Den in a brown loveseat. It's well made with a good zipper and the fabric is a good weight for a pillow cover. The images printed on it are dynamic and eye catching which I loved, but unfortunately the main color was too brassy. I reluctantly returned it.
Had to return. Color darker than depicted. Seemed to be nice quality.

评论概述: Thick texture & Darker orange than shown
评论详情: One thing to note: the color is more of a darker burnt orange than the bright yellow shown in photos. This richer tone adds warmth and pairs beautifully with earthy or jewel-toned palettes. If you’re looking for a throw pillow cover with a chic animal print and a luxurious feel, this is a great option. Just keep in mind that the color leans more towards burnt orange/brown than the yellow depicted in the photos.
Love this pillow!  Great quality.  I recommend.  Really added a pop of color and interest to my couch!
I love the pair of these pillows I purchased.  They stay firm and look great.  I ordered a firm pillow insert.
20x20 cover is thick and good quality. I bought down inserts and they look perfect. Color is exactly as it was described.
I ordered 4 of the pillow covers and each one was as pictured. The fabric is thick and colors are perfect. The quality is high end.

These pillow covers are very very well made.  The zipper was so easy to use and the quality of the fabric is 10/10.  Highly recommend these to anyone looking to freshen up a room with new pillow covers!  The color is a rich Caramel color.  The leopards are true to what a leopard should look like!  Love them
Love these - so expensive feeling and looking

Bought the leopard covers and the quality is incredible but I was looking for a mustard colour (as per the pic) and they are brown so sadly it doesn't work with my space and therefore have to return them.
